name: Etherym Power Canceller
text:
You can banish 1 "Etherym" monster from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target. An "Etherym" Xyz Monster Xyz Summoned with this card as Xyz Material gains this effect:
? You can detach 2 Xyz Materials from this card (Quick Effect); Banish 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls.
